metadata.title: CVE-2021-22879 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Nextcloud Desktop Client prior to 3.1.3 is vulnerable to resource injection by way of missing validation of URLs, allowing a malicious server to execute remote commands. User interaction is needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: nextcloud-desktop package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
